titleStmt.title: A vindication of The reasonableness of Christianity, &c. from Mr. Edwards's reflections
titleStmt.author: Locke, John, 1632-1704.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Awnsham and John Churchil,

notesStmt.note: Appears in his The reasonableness of Christianity. London, 1696.
